weak.content: Was responsible for helping with various projects and assisting the team with stuff.
weak.description: Very weak power statement - no action verbs, no metrics, vague

excellent.content: Led cross-functional team of 12 engineers to deliver enterprise platform 3 months ahead of schedule, reducing customer onboarding time by 75% and generating $2.4M in new revenue within 6 months.
excellent.description: Excellent power statement - strong action verb, quantified impact, clear context

needsMetrics.content: Developed new features for the product and improved team productivity.
needsMetrics.description: Has action verb but lacks specific metrics and impact

hasMetricsNoContext.content: Reduced processing time by 50% and increased throughput by 200%.
hasMetricsNoContext.description: Has metrics but lacks context about scope and business impact

goodButVerbose.content: Basically, I was essentially responsible for leading a very large team that worked on developing a cutting-edge, best-in-class solution that helped to somewhat improve the overall customer experience and resulted in some revenue improvements.
goodButVerbose.description: Has structure but too many filler words and jargon, weak opening

strongAction.content: Architected scalable microservices infrastructure supporting 10M daily active users across 15 global regions.
strongAction.description: Strong action verb, good specifics, but could use more impact metrics
